Heimsuchung Mariä.title: The Visitation
Heimsuchung Mariä.alt_text: A detailed black-and-white engraving titled 'The Visitation' by Diana Scultori, depicting the biblical meeting between the Virgin Mary and Elizabeth. The figures are elegantly rendered, standing in a lush outdoor setting with classical architectural elements in the background.

Verkündigung des Herrn.title: Annunciation
Verkündigung des Herrn.alt_text: A depiction of the Annunciation with the angel Gabriel appearing to the Virgin Mary in a richly colored and dramatic setting.
